body_html: My environment is Tesla P100x4 without NV-link. The initialization time cost for Keras applications are all increased, and I think both CUDA environment and Keras engine itself are not the root-causes, and the example script is also not the root-cause as well, because all of these 3 components are not changed, while the only changes is the version of Tensorflow for cuda.

body: My environment is Tesla P100x4 without NV-link. The initialization time cost for Keras applications are all increased, and I think both CUDA environment and Keras engine itself are not the root-causes, and the example script is also not the root-cause as well, because all of these 3 components are not changed, while the only changes is the version of Tensorflow for cuda.
